hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Bow#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ GS Scrub Room

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
